subject: Uploading 3.0.25rc1 now
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Folks,

The SAMBA_3_0_RELEASE tree is frozen.  The tarball is
cut.  I'll make the public release announcements in
a few hours.  But I wanted to take this opportunity
to remind everyone of Bugzilla Day tomorrow.
(http://wiki.samba.org/index.php/Bugzilla_Day)

See you tomorrow on irc://irc.freenode.net/#samba-technical




cheers, jerry
- --
=====================================================================
Samba                                    ------- http://www.samba.org
Centeris                         -----------  http://www.centeris.com
"What man is a man who does not make the world better?"      --Balian
